title: Ride or Die
short_cast: Kiko Mizuhara, Honami Sato, Yoko Maki, Anne Suzuki, Tetsushi Tanaka, Sara Minami, Yui Uemura, Shinya Niiro, Shunsuke Tanaka, Setsuko Karasuma
cast: Kiko Mizuhara, Honami Sato, Yoko Maki, Anne Suzuki, Tetsushi Tanaka, Sara Minami, Yui Uemura, Shinya Niiro, Shunsuke Tanaka, Setsuko Karasuma
genre: Japanese, LGBTQ Movies, Dramas, Romantic Movies
desc: Rei helps the woman she’s been in love with for years escape her abusive husband. While on the run, their feelings for each other catch fire.
